name: Dog's Best Friend (ryan2949)
description:
Arrow Keys to Move | Escape to Pause

--- Dog's Best Friend! ---

In this short game, you play as a dog that is searching for parts scattered across different areas. While the fireplace keeps you warm inside, the weather outside is very cold! The longer you stay out, the colder you get and the more you slide across the ground. Use this mechanic to slide up walls and find your way to the end of each level!

Thanks for checking it out! It's my first game, and it was made in 48 hours!

Made for Godot Wild Jam #53:
https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-53
